content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (around x=-5.0, y=2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position x=-9.5, y=-0.5 (extracts water)
- Boiler at position x=-5.0, y=2.5 (converts water to steam)
- Steam engine at position x=-0.5, y=2.5 (generates electricity)
- Burner inserter at position x=-6.5, y=2.5 (feeds coal to boiler)
- Pipe system connecting water from offshore pump to boiler
- Pipe system connecting steam from boiler to steam engine
- Small electric pole at position x=-0.5, y=5.5 (distributes power)

### Coal Mining Systems
#### Main Coal Mining System (around x=16.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position x=16.0, y=0.0 (mines coal)
- Wooden chest at position x=17.5, y=-0.5 (collects coal)
- Burner inserter at position x=17.5, y=0.5 (moves coal from chest to transport belt)
- Transport belt system connecting coal to the boiler

#### Boiler Coal Mining System (around x=16.0, y=5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position x=16.0, y=5.0 (mines coal)
- Wooden chest at position x=17.5, y=4.5 (collects coal)
- Burner inserter at position x=17.5, y=5.5 (moves coal from chest to transport belt)
- Transport belt system connecting coal to the boiler

#### Iron Area Coal Mining System (around x=18.0, y=21.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position x=18.0, y=21.0 (mines coal)
- Wooden chest at position x=19.5, y=20.5 (collects coal)
- Burner inserter at position x=19.5, y=21.5 (moves coal from chest to transport belt)
- Transport belt system connecting coal to the iron furnace

### Iron Mining and Smelting System (around x=15.5, y=70.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position x=15.5, y=70.5 (mines iron ore)
- Stone furnace at position x=16.0, y=73.0 (smelts iron ore into plates)
- Small electric pole connecting power to the electric mining drill
- Wooden chest at position x=14.5, y=73.5 (for collecting iron plates)
- Burner inserter at position x=13.5, y=73.5 (moves iron plates from chest to belt)
- Burner inserter at position x=15.5, y=74.5 (extracts iron plates from furnace)
- Transport belt at position x=12.5, y=73.5 (for iron plates)
- Transport belt system bringing coal to the furnace
- Burner inserter at position x=14.5, y=74.5 (moves items from belt to furnace)
- Burner inserter at position x=14.5, y=76.5 (added to take iron plates from chest to belt)

### Copper Mining and Smelting System (around x=-46.5, y=70.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position x=-46.5, y=70.5 (mines copper ore)
- Stone furnace at position x=-46.0, y=74.0 (smelts copper ore)
- Burner inserter at position x=-46.5, y=72.5 (moves copper ore from drill to furnace)
- Burner inserter at position x=-44.5, y=74.5 (extracts copper plates from furnace)
- Small electric pole connecting power to the electric mining drill

### Manufacturing Area (around x=30.5, y=80.5)
Consists of the following entities:

#### Iron Gear Assembly System
- Assembling machine at
